title: Kayle?
body: Is she getting a rework soon? Please say yes.

replies.body: Not even on the schedule and no real need for one.
I strongly feel like she needs one..
why's that?
Cuz ur doomed if you do and you're doomed if u dont. What counter play is there to a 1v5 aoe machine that doesnt die.

> [{quoted}](name=Rip Rengo 2016,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7lfjoExU,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-16T02:09:00.881+0000)
>
> Cuz ur doomed if you do and you're doomed if u dont. What counter play is there to a 1v5 aoe machine that doesnt die.

Kayle is super squishy and lacks hard CC. Play her for 10 games and you'll see her drawbacks.

"lacks hard cc" Bro, she can literally slow an entire team while shredding them with insane DPS. I'm not saying shes gana win every game, but her kit is insanely broken. She doesn't need to be tanky, thats wut her ult is for.

> [{quoted}](name=Rip Rengo 2016,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7lfjoExU,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-16T04:27:30.920+0000)
>
> "lacks hard cc" Bro, she can literally slow an entire team while shredding them with insane DPS. I'm not saying shes gana win every game, but her kit is insanely broken. She doesn't need to be tanky, thats wut her ult is for.

http://i.imgur.com/uDNqsKs.gif

And you don't even play Kayle a single time....

https://media.giphy.com/media/6OWIl75ibpuFO/giphy.gif
I have played kayle lol.
Why? She's been one of the strongest top champs all year and literally can play 4 of 5 positions.
I mean should realistically do all 5.
Hope not
i hope so, she's too rewarding for how low her skill cap is, same thing with {{champion:122}}
actually
actually what? they're both easy, not a single skill shot on either and they're decently tanky as well while outputting stupid damage

Darius gets kited extremely easily, as well as his lack of escapes from ganks. His pull has a short range, so he will have trouble catching carries with good positioning. Darius is basically useless in team fights unless he procs his Noxian Might.
I have one problem with kayle. Too braindead of a champ. It would be nice to see some changes that brings up her skill cap.
someone asked about a morgana rework and riot said that when they do rework morgana they would rework kayle at the same time but it isnt scheduled or being worked on at all right now
If so, behind Warwick and Galio at least.

Kayle is completely item reliant.... which is why she sucks at support... despite seeming like she should be able to.

If Kayle is OP it is probably because some item is OP.

She doesn't appear to be OP, what division are you in...?, Did you feed her, it sounds like you fed her and she got ahead on items, remember she is completely item reliant, she gets the jump on you with items you are in trouble, but if you hold her down she becomes an invunerability bot.
I mean.. Between silver and mid plat she does the same shit. Ult and wack 5 ppl till they die or are forced to run because of the rest of her team aiding her. (even if she doesn't need it)

well kayle's weaknesses are pretty much summed up in one sentence:
She NEEDS ITEMS TO DO ANYTHING

If kayle doesn't get a {{item:3115}}  she won't be autoing for a while

if kayle doesn't build {{item:3116}}  she can't kite

If kayle doesn't build {{item:3006}} she can't auto attack fast enough to make a difference

Those are kayle's three main Items that make her powerful.

If you shut down kayle early she becomes absolutely useless late-game
an impossible to itemize against cancer just like {{champion:84}}  that both need a rework. more than warwick.
